Scrivener.background_description: You copy ancient texts and illuminate manuscripts, recording the voices of the clever, the great, and the powerful. You will prove that the pen truly is mightier than the sword.

table1.question: What work did you keep for yourself?

options.description: The Wild Tongue. A bundle of leather-bound scrolls. A seminal work, cataloging the hidden languages of beasts and how to understand them.

items.name: The Wild Tongue
items.description: A bundle of leather-bound scrolls. A seminal work, cataloging the hidden languages of beasts and how to understand them.

options.description: The Silent Symphony. Bound in fluorescent wrap. Very rare, it chronicles the subtle signs used by those employing invisibility magic.

items.name: The Silent Symphony
items.description: Bound in fluorescent wrap. Very rare, it chronicles the subtle signs used by those employing invisibility magic.

options.description: A Treatise on the Abyss. A nondescript black book. An in-depth, largely theoretical text describing the Roots, as well as information about the location of a nearby Gate.

items.name: A Treatise on the Abyss
items.description: A nondescript black book. An in-depth, largely theoretical text describing the Roots, as well as information about the location of a nearby Gate.

options.description: The Star Waltz. A comet-shaped clasp bound in a fine leather cover. Detailed astronomical charts, celestial movements, and stellar festivals. Highly valued (100gp) for its usefulness to travelers.

items.name: The Star Waltz

options.description: The Cathedral and the Canopy. Large-leaf binding over vellum. Nominally a children's storybook, the margins detail information about traveling, eating, and sleeping in the cloud forests.

options.description: Garden of Glass. Bound in the cover of another book. A heretical work, it describes the materials, procedures, and optimal locations required to open a Gate.

table2.question: How do you transcribe sensitive information?

options.description: Fib Ink. Glows when used to write true statements but fades if used to write false ones.

items.name: Fib Ink
items.description: Glows when used to write true statements but fades if used to write false ones.

options.description: Cipher Stone. A pair of sharp black stones. Each one decrypts any message written by the other.

items.name: Cipher Stone

options.description: Everquill. A quill that writes on any surface. You still need ink.

options.description: Whisper Vial. Whisper a message into the vial, and it will play it back to whoever opens it next.

options.description: Sanguine Lens. Extracts blood from a target without their knowledge. A stolen drop placed on the eye reveals memories from the past day.
